mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.bucket_name, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.bucket_state, count(b.id) as bucketListCount, c.category_name FROM bucket b JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE b.bucket_state = #{bucketState} and b.user_id = #{userId} and c.id = #{categoryId}
SELECT count(*) FROM category WHERE id = #{categoryId};
